chapters.title: Chapter 2: Saidin
chapters.info: Loial, p. 46 (29)—Ogier from Stedding Shangtai, son of Arent son of Halan. He is young for an Ogier at ninety, which for an Ogier is not even old enough to be outside the stedding alone without permission of the Elders. He is fond of books, and is rarely seen without one.
